survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the impact of workplace noise on employee productivity and identify potential solutions to minimize distractions.

questions.question_text: How often do you experience distracting noise in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear scale to measure frequency of noise distractions. Ensure options are mutually exclusive and cover the full range of possible responses.

script.question_text: How often do you experience distracting noise in your workplace?

questions.question_text: What types of noise are most distracting to you in the workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture various noise sources. Include an 'Other' option to account for unlisted noise types.

script.question_text: What types of noise are most distracting to you in the workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How does workplace noise affect your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to measure the perceived impact of noise on productivity. Include both positive and negative effects.

script.question_text: How does workplace noise affect your productivity?

questions.question_text: What strategies do you currently use to cope with workplace noise? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Listen to music or white noise
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand current coping mechanisms. Include 'None of the above' for respondents who do not use any strategies.
